articles.title: Dead Cells' development is officially over as devs focus on new games - Game Developer
articles.description: Motion Twin and Evil Empire are done working on the 2D roguelike, and are moving on to their own individual projects.
articles.content:
Motion Twin and Evil Empire are calling it and done further developing Dead Cells.
Ahead of the game's 35th update, Motion Twin revealed it'd be the final one for the 2D roguelike. Both studios will… [+1510 chars]
